#summary A description of Linux utilities used.

= Introduction =

The following Linux utilities are used to create the HTTP GETs sent to the gObject Management System:

 - Linux shell
 - cron
 - ifconfig
 - iwconfig
 - iwlist
 - grep
 - cut
 - sed
 - cat
 - wc
 - wget
